item.description:
Eaglewind, who learned with the Lakota people, but is himself Mohawk, will be helping us to understand how we can find out our animal totem and/or guide.  I have known Eaglewind for a few years, and he walks the native path every day. 

Please bring enough food for four people as we will have lunch before the gathering!  I know you will enjoy this time together with like minded people, learning how to walk with the earth in yet another way!  Remember, the RSVP count does not include everyone who actually attends.  I do hope to see you soon!

We should be finished by 4:00 PM.

And welcome to all our new members! 

 

dance in the light of spirit!

Susan Gale
item.how_to_find_us: just come to the upper porch and walk in!
item.name: Animal Totems and Animal Guides
